name: Compact Firepower
Lore: 'The small blasters used by biker scouts can be fired when piloting a vehicle at high speed.',
Text: 'If your warrior just fired a DH-17 blaster or scout blaster during a battle, draw destiny: (0) no effect, (1-3) target may not use weapons this turn, (4+) target is power and forfeit = 0 this battle.',
